description: Karnataka Hijab Row Live News, Bangalore Today Updates, Bengaluru, Karnataka News Live, 18 Feb: The Congress on Thursday staged an overnight protest in the Karnataka Assembly demanding minister KS Eshwarappaâ€™s resignation over his remarks that the saffron flag might become the national flag in the future.
